title: I assume Riot is torpedoing the Lux/Ezreal ship due to her specific quote toward him

embed.description: This is the updated Lux in English. Purchase RP via Amazon (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

body:
"Are we supposed to be... dating, or something? We've never even talked."

Can't make the pairing work, Jaredan?

EDIT: Confirmed, it's specific to Ezreal.
https://youtu.be/DtFrbd4Z_MI

replies.body: As a member of the anime community: canon isn't enough to stop a ship.
That's why they used a torpedo.

A ship cannot be destroyed by any means.

It can only run out of fuel.

So there still a chance?
{{champion:81}} X{{champion:44}}
After listening Taric's VO I am shipping {{champion:44}} x {{champion:131}}

Chances are for those who don't understand the way of the world, the way of beauty.  In our hearts Taric and Ezreal always will and always have been a pair.  It is just the way the world is, for if it isn't so then how could the world be beautiful?
i dont get what taric sees in him, he deserves better

Remember, Beauty in all things.  Just because you cannot see the wonder that dwells within something doesn't mean it doesn't exist.  It is easy to love something _because_, because it is beautiful, or wonderful, or awe inspiring.  True love is in the despite.  Loving something despite it's flaws.  Being willing to put aside differences, to look past the ugly side and see the gem inside.

That is something we too often forget.  It is the lesson I learned from Taric, because playing him has truly shaped me over the years.  I used to be dark and cynical, and a part of the still dwells within me.  However due to Taric I can now look on all things and attempt to look past their flaws to find the beauty within.  It is the reason I haven't given up on this community or the people in it, and if I can look past the shadows at the heart of League players to try and help them and appreciate the beauty within then who is to question my mentor's ability to see beauty at the heart of Ezreal?
i fucking died "to look past the ugly side and see the gem inside" and your name

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=k30z7yUW,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2017-03-08T05:42:32.844+0000)
>
> i dont get what taric sees in him, he deserves better

It's not what Taric *sees* in him. It's what he wants to *put* in him. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
i dont think so because whats worse than having a line that disproves it is how they gave taric 0 lines towards ezreal at all LOL
Well Ezreal got retconned away from Demacia to Piltover, so it doesn't really make sense for them to be a canon couple.
Wasn't he always from Piltover, and just studied for a time in Demacia?
I think he was associated with Demacia in the old lore, but now he has nothing to do with it at all.
He was not. Always Piltover.
He was always Piltover, but he had friends everywhere.  He got around quite a bit.
giggity
he was always from Piltover. but since he traveled and explored so much he had encounters with people from both Demacia and Noxus, who are the major kingdoms.
This line didn't make sense to me because Ez and Lux are listed as friends on their champion pages. Which means her new VO retcons. x.x
I imagine that once Lux gets her new lore, her connection with Ezreal will be removed.
Gonna be honest: I've had a pretty shitty past few weeks, but the moment I heard that line my day brightened.
{{champion:99}} _Brightens_ everyones day
https://media.giphy.com/media/OXARmj8PYUgM0/giphy.gif

I'm pretty sure the best part was, "Kat and Garen sitting in a tree". Nah, I'm jk.

"I'm sure your wife forgives you for getting her soul taken by a remorseless creature of darkness." BOON, GET REKT LUCIAN.
ezreal confirmed beta orbiter
I got a hell of a good laugh hearing that. Im not against it but god i was imaging people's reactions.
This just means Riot cares about their lore, and don't just follow random, idiotic fandom shippings.
despite the fact it was riot themselves that started the ship (intentional or not)

Well this fan art happened once:
http://i.imgur.com/m7myr8w.jpg

and then Riot was like: "We ship it"
http://i.imgur.com/KdF1aoX.png

It never made much sense particularly after they revamped the lore (and it was always prettttttty  dumb wasn't it?)

but yeah they live very very far from each other and prob wouldn't ever meet. same goes for taric and ezreal!
You get it. I applaud you. Few others get the problems with hte ship.
Downvoted for not being weebs or fan girls rip
Yep. It's a sad world where people downvote you for not having the same ship as them.
Downvoted for not having the same downvoting policies.

Maybe now {{champion:86}} x {{champion:99}}  will be canon? :-P

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MaG2RQA9Jpk/UEIyux7xW3I/AAAAAAAAAMg/QvoZ5KfOgy4/s1600/talesofvaloran008.png

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6NlSoqFt99E/U7g5EXs9eZI/AAAAAAAAAgM/0P6vjTiIGFo/s1600/talesofvaloran041.png

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-y5Fo3NT8yPc/U54L5047_RI/AAAAAAAAAfg/Lad9eLvJ_lw/s1600/talesofvaloran042.png

NO, NONE OF THIS! 

SOMEONE GET THE HOLY WATER!

Awww why not?
They have so much in common... same country, same friends... same parents... XD

but what about this?

https://leaguefactions.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/ezreal-lux-sketch.jpg

is it merely just a dream!?

Probably. Not to mention, they're not above changing the lore suddenly. Ekko now has parents, when he didn't before. And he was released post-retcon. No reason why they're obligated to keep that ship.

I'm just sitting here like thinking: wait.. what? Ekko?
I haven't been 100% up to date with the new zaun/piltover lore update, I only read a bit of them...

Tbh, I don't blame them for changing lore, and it IS a drawing. It might still be somewhat canon that Ez has a crush on Lux, but Lux is like: you wot m8? 

Like she IS from a really wealthy family. So.. oh and, you do realize some champions do have sassy quotes to an enemy of x champ but a compliment/positive attitude towards the allied version. 

Tahm to allied ahri - http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/a/a8/TahmKench.tauntAhri02.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150624151221
("I am enthralled by your class and refinement - I must offer you a token of my admirations.")
To enemy - http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/76/TahmKench.tauntAhri01.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150624151220
("You're as modest as a freshly-paid courtesan.")

So... maybe this is also just a talk of a "no I don't like you because you are on the other team" moment. (Sort of like a passive way of tilting someone) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Usually, those taunts get to be more mean if there's also an ally quote. Taliyah, for example, even towards an enemy ekko, will talk about how she's got a crush on him.

So I think they only do that when there's also an ally taunt.

In addition, I don't really think that it works out, because a noblewoman wouldn't be seeing some explorer. And before you say that they could be doing it in secret, remember that this is Demacia. Where nothing seems to escape the government's sight.

Well.. Garen has a crush on Kat... Then again, she is actually a noble woman... But she is Noxian.. dun dun duuun, forbidden love -- Garen and Kat, siting in a tree.... and you better only be holding hands or I'm telling >:C ..
######I wonder who she will tell....

But that won't mean Ez can't have a crush... Or it's just riots quirky way of saying "They are characters in a game that can't really talk to each other" lol
But I do agree that riot is probably trying to sink the ship.
And I'm totally happy with them trying to sink the ship.

I just realized all those people who draws fan art and stuff...

Stalker/Overly attached Ezreal incoming .. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Riot could say they're siblings and people would still say they're perfect together.
Humans {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
So sad yet so true.
~~Incest is wincest~~ That's just plain wrong.
Never said it was right. I was just saying people are sick twisted ####'s who don't care about how biology works.
